posts.post_content:
A couple of rarer ungraded cards are offered.

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/13786/browne-g.-chi[/IMG]

Just George, not Mordecai, aka Five-fingered Browne, only $35 shipped.  Good+

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10937/hart-j-r-sl[/IMG]

James Henry Hart from the Montgomery Climbers of the Southern Association.  Did you know that he was known as "Hub" Hart?  Put Hub in your collection for $38 shipped.  Good

Take both for $70 and they will be shipped together.
I will take them.  pm coming
